promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a massive strong horse dark-type pokemon wearing a regal mask. It can be found in cave-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, dark or horse. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Regaluske, a a massive strong horse dark-type pokemon. It can be found in cave-like environments It has the following abilities: Darkness Fang, Captivate. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "horse", "dark" or "Regaluske". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of dark-type pokemon, horse-like, strong, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, dreamy background
generatedDescription: In its cavernous abode lies Regaluske, the stalwart equine specter, enchanting foes with its Captivate power and striking with Darkness Fang.
